Sentencas: MnGaxCr2-xO4 (MGCO, x=0.1, 0.2, 0.4, 0.8, 1) oxides are synthesised using a citric acid nitrate combustion method.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of MnGaxCr2-xO4 (0.1≤x≤1) spinels as potential electrode support materials for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The influence of Ga substitution on the structure, electrical conductivity and electrochemical performance are systematically investigated.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of MnGaxCr2-xO4 (0.1≤x≤1) spinels as potential electrode support materials for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The chemical and thermal compatibility of MGCO materials with yttrium-stabilised zirconia (YSZ) are also studied.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of MnGaxCr2-xO4 (0.1≤x≤1) spinels as potential electrode support materials for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: All the samples exhibit a single phase spinel structure.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of MnGaxCr2-xO4 (0.1≤x≤1) spinels as potential electrode support materials for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Thermal expansion coefficients (TECs) of the MGCO oxides are in the range of 9-12x10(-6) K-1, indicating a good thermal match with the YSZ electrolyte.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of MnGaxCr2-xO4 (0.1≤x≤1) spinels as potential electrode support materials for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: No chemical reactions are detected between MGCO materials and YSZ, indicating their good chemical compatibility with YSZ.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of MnGaxCr2-xO4 (0.1≤x≤1) spinels as potential electrode support materials for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The magnitude of electrical conductivity of all the obtained samples is in the order of about 10(-3) S cm(-l) at 800 degrees C measured in air.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of MnGaxCr2-xO4 (0.1≤x≤1) spinels as potential electrode support materials for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The polarisation resistance reaches a value as low as 5.2 Omega cm(2) for x=0.4 at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of MnGaxCr2-xO4 (0.1≤x≤1) spinels as potential electrode support materials for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The preliminary results demonstrate that MGCO materials could be used as electrode support materials for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of MnGaxCr2-xO4 (0.1≤x≤1) spinels as potential electrode support materials for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
